alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Weld County through 545 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Kersey, or 15 miles southeast of Greeley, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kersey, Riverside Reservoir, Gill and Barnesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
